com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class Boat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.GameObject
      • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.MovableObject
        • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.Boat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIBoat, PlayerBoat

    abstract class Boat
extends MovableObject
implements CollisionObject
    Base class for all boat types. Contains all functionality for moving, taking damage and collision

    • Constructor Detail

      • Boat

        Boat(int x,
     int y)
        Construct a Boat object at point (x,y) with default size, texture and animation.
        Parameters:
        x - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat

      • Boat

        Boat(int x,
     int y,
     int w,
     int h,
     java.lang.String texture_path)
        Construct a Boat object with at point (x,y) with width and height and texture path with default stats (stamina usage, durability, etc).
        Parameters:
        x - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        w - int width of the new boat
        h - int height of the new boat
        texture_path - String relative path from the core/assets folder of the boats texture image

      • Boat

        Boat(int x,
     int y,
     int w,
     int h,
     java.lang.String texture_path,
     java.lang.String name,
     float durability_per_hit,
     float stamina_usage,
     float stamina_regen)
        Construct a Boat object with all parameters specified.
        Parameters:
        x - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        w - int width of the new boat
        h - int height of the new boat
        texture_path - String relative path from the core/assets folder of the boats texture image
        durability_per_hit - float percentage (0-1) of the max durability taken each hit
        name - String of the boat seen when the game ends
        stamina_regen - float percentage of stamina regenerated each frame (0-1)
        stamina_usage - float percentage of stamina used each frame when accelerating (0-1)

        public void setStartTime(long start_time)
        Sets the start time of a boat in milliseconds. E.g. Pass use System.currentTimeMillis() to get current system time and pass this long into this method.
        Parameters:
        start_time - long value which is start time of the boat.

      • getStartTime

        public long getStartTime(boolean inSeconds)
        Returns the long value start time of the boat.
        Parameters:
        inSeconds - boolean to decide if the time should be returned in seconds or in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the long value start time

        Parameters:
        end_time - long value which is end time of the boat.
